attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND RENT TO OWN ON SELECTED CARS. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted , delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value. 
PRE-OWNED CAR DEALERSHIP IN GAUTENG JOHANNESBURG WITH VEHICLES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. YOU CAN COME THROUGH TO OUR DEALERSHIP AT NO. 6 JOUBERT STREET AND CORNER ALBERT, BEHIND SARS OFFICES. PLEASE DO CONTACT OUR EXECUTIVE SALES REP. VUYO ON 0763933070 OR CALL ON 0100234810. 

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.

This is the perfect vehicle for a modern family.

attributes.description: Wow. This SUV With It's Sleek Lines Is Stunning! Low Low Mileage Of ONLY 31 000km. Fully Specced And Ready To Go. Features Include A Panoramic Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, LED Headlights, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Bluetooth, Multimedia System With USB And Auxiliary Input, Preparation For App Connect, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Roof Rail, Electric Tailgate And 19 Inch Alloy Wheels. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.

xtended 2-year warranty available to purchase for all vehicles purchased from us.

For your Peace of Mind and Ours - We are fully compliant with the Health and Safety measures relating to Covid 19 with all our vehicles fully disinfected after each viewing or test drive, Hand Sanitizer on arrival for all people entering and face masks worn by all. The social distancing rule of 2m is easily adhered to as we have a spacious lot, and it is outdoors too, so call us right away for a comfortable viewing by appointment only.
